Excellence in Entertainment
Our family has worked to create special events and memories, for 1000’s of people over many years.  From weddings and birthdays, to unique and exciting events you could say entertainment is in our blood.

Our Family Welcomes Your Family To The Horse Power Pavilion
The Holland Family moved from Todmorden, UK to Freeport, USA in 2018 with aspirations for a new and exciting life.  With a history of providing hospitality, events and wedding services for over a decade, they wanted to bring their unique style to the United States.
The decision to move to Freeport was based on a love for all things American.  From muscle cars and to music (and especially the people), the decision to was an easy one.
The Birth of a Dream
So was born the Horse Power Pavilion.  A 37 acres entertainment ranch, dedicated to family fun.  Horse Power Pavilion is many things to many people.  From Wedding Venue to Muscle Car Meets, There is something for everyone.
Wedding Venue (The TeePees)
Wedding Bookings are available Horse Power Pavilion.  We have wonderful facilities for your special day. From giant wedding teepees to a full catering service, we can help your day go off grace and beauty.
Kick Ass Coffee
Kick Ass Coffee is a coffee trailer located at  4497 State Highway 20 W. Our expert coffee baristas are waiting to server you a variety of freshly ground coffees with a selection of favours and snacks.
Hairy Hogg Brewery
Horse Power Pavilion is proud to be the home of the Hair Hogg Brewery.  When you order a beer at our bar, you know we know everything that goes into your glass!
Hamilton's Bistro
Named after the eldest Son of the Holland Family, Hamilton’s offers a mixture of flavours of the south as well as a unique taste of England.  From Smoked Meats to Traditional English Fish and Chips, there is something for everyone’s taste.
The Holland Cottage (Accommodation)
A beautiful Private 1 bedroom suite with large bathroom and open living space. With access to pool and fire pit areas set within the private ‘Horse Power Pavilion” Ranch. Onsite coffee trailer yet only 20 minutes to the most beautiful beaches on the emerald coast. Water access for small boat or kayak is located next to the property. This suite has kitchenette area with microwave and fridge freezer. Ample parking and a real feel of peace and quiet out in the countryside. Relax and unwind at our beautiful property.
Horse Power Events
As the name suggestions, we love beautiful cars with serious horse power!  Our ranch regularly hosts car show.  The tradition for all types of car enthusiast is an exciting one.  For years, people from all across the country have met at our location to show their cars and create community.
Hungry Heifer BBQ
Hungry Heifer BBQ offer smoked meats and a taste of Florida.  Working to traditional southern receipts and methods, we are able to represent that southern flavour that people keep coming back for.  With an amazing selection of side orders, you’ll be spoilt for choice.

Ways to get in touch
Need help with a Booking?
You can check availability and book online or on the phone
+1 850 520 1737
Working Hours:
7.00 am – 2.00 pm Monday to Friday
7.00 am – 10.00 pm Saturday & Bank Holidays
7.00 am – 7.00 pm Sundays
Give us a call
Feedback and Complaints
Good or bad, we want to hear your feedback! If it’s a complaint you’d like to make, please send us an email using the link below and we’ll do our utmost to make it right.
Or why not check out our completely unedited feedback via our friends.
